thread.title: Dan ODonnell
thread.title_full: Hack Repair Website Security Services, USA, Call (619) 479-6637 | We Fix Hacked Websites reviewed by Dan ODonnell

author: Dan ODonnell
title: Dan ODonnell
text: On a Sunday, 3 time zones away from Hack Repair, I made a desperate call for help. I spoke to a real person quickly, supplied login details and waited, but NOT LONG. Jim stayed in touch as he went through the process of removing suspicious files, updating the WordPress core/plugins and restoring the site back to normal before the end of the day. Great job, fast turnaround! So happy that it also included recommendations and updating of settings in our WordFence plugin!
